# errors

**Instance Property**

A list of custom errors to display on the payment sheet.

## Declaration

```swift
sequence <ApplePayError> errors;
```

## Discussion

List the errors on the payment sheet for the user to remedy. If there are multiple errors, list the most critical error first. For information about errors, see [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayError].

## Providing authorization results

- **status**: The status code for the authorization result.
